item.title: ::item command
item.dc:creator: @fearrichy fearrichy
item.description:
@fearrichy wrote:

Just add if (p.getRights() >= 2) { above else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

And it should work.

Read full topic
